title: How to Change a Windows XP Product Key

steps.title: Click start in the bottom left corner, then click run.
steps.content: Click start in the bottom left corner, then click run.

steps.title: Type 'Regedit' in the white text field, and click OK.
steps.content: Type 'Regedit' in the white text field, and click OK. This should open the Registry Editor.

steps.title: Navigate to the following registry key.
steps.content: Navigate to the following registry key. Hkey_local_machine\Software\Microsoft\WindowsNT\Current Version\WPAEvents

steps.title: Right click 'OOBETimer', in that registry key that you just navigated to and then click 'Modify'.
steps.content: Right click 'OOBETimer', in that registry key that you just navigated to and then click 'Modify'.

steps.title: Change one or more digits to anything random.
steps.content: Change one or more digits to anything random.

steps.title: Click start and then click run.
steps.content: Click start and then click run.

steps.title: Paste '%systemroot%\system32\oobe\msoobe.exe /a', in the white text field,.
steps.content: Paste '%systemroot%\system32\oobe\msoobe.exe /a', in the white text field,.

steps.title: Select 'Yes, I want to telephone a customer service representative to activate Windows', then click next.
steps.content: Select 'Yes, I want to telephone a customer service representative to activate Windows', then click next.

steps.title: Type the new product key into the small white text fields and then click update.
steps.content: Type the new product key into the small white text fields and then click update.

steps.title: Check that you get a message similar to 'You have successfully activated your copy of Windows.'
steps.content: Check that you get a message similar to 'You have successfully activated your copy of Windows.' , if you do, restart your computer, and you're done!

steps.title: Make sure you are connected to the internet in this process!
steps.content: Make sure you are connected to the internet in this process!

steps.title: Download the Windows Key Updater Tool.
steps.content: Download the Windows Key Updater Tool.

steps.title: Click Next.
steps.content: Click Next. This tool will scan your system for any inconsistency or errors. Wait for the scan to finish.

steps.title: Type in the new product key.
steps.content: Type in the new product key. You might be required to activate your system again.

steps.title: Restart your computer.
steps.content: Restart your computer. This will allow the changes to take place. You might be required to activate your system again.
